review: While the stick is very easy to set up and make work, the familiarity and recent level of movies and tv shows available free is not what the advertising might lead you to believe. We've watched some totally obscure free movies with mixed feelings of enjoyment or not, but doing a search for things we missed in the theater and would like to see only leads to their availability if we pay for them. From the standpoint of expecting to replace cable movie channels with the stick, it will leave you a bit lacking.
author: Dennis Miller

review: I can't use it since it is to weak to pick up my wifi.  My other wifi items are able to work just fine.
author: Kirk Kremer
